topic: Calculating pixel value at a specific location in an image
body:
Greetings all,


I'm trying to use 'pvalue' to calculate a pixel value at a specific  
x,y location in an image by piping  'pvalue' through 'rcalc',  and am  
stuck on the correct syntax to use for the expression, '-e', in 'rcalc':


pvalue -o -h  -H  rendered_image.hdr | rcalc -e  
'(x_location,y_location)'


Has anyone tackled this in the past?


As always, thanks!


Chris
